name: QUESTION FIGHT
description: Dare to fight? Trivia with a two player twist! Question Fight is the two player version of Fact or Wack and is the ultimate multiplayer trivia game with some surprises thrown in. You're player one, while your friend or family member is player two. Try to defeat your opponent. There are twelve challenging and hilarious levels with tons of questions. Questions range from movies, sports, technology, music, current/past events, and a ton more! Get FACT OR WACK as well!
